column4: will upgrade from 8.04 to 8.10 in my macbook santa rosa mess up my system? (was very hard for me getting triple booting in a macbook)
make a backup of the parts, that were difficult... then you may want to try it
the parts that were difficult were to set up correct disk partitions in order not to mess up the bootloader, can't make a backup of that heh
a upgrade to 8.10 should not change anything in the partition table, but only inside the used filesystems and maybe the boot sector or mbr (like it does, when upgrading only grub, for example)
